logged.message: Welcome back, {{username}}! Manage your farms and crops efficiently.

onboarding.title: Easy Onboarding
onboarding.description: Quick and simple registration process for farmers with support for multiple languages.

farms.title: Farm Management
farms.description: Add and manage multiple farms under your profile with detailed tracking.

crops.title: Crop Management
crops.description: Track different crops for each farm with detailed information.

demand.title: Market Demand & Pricing
demand.description: View daily demand and price updates for your crops in real-time.

harvest.title: Harvest Planning
harvest.description: Create and manage harvest plans for each crop with scheduling.

pickup.title: Pickup & Payments
pickup.description: Track pickup confirmations, gradation reports, and receive timely payments.
